name: Erdinger Weizen
description:
The famous Bavarian specialty

Erdinger Weissbier 'crystal clear' is particularly welcome as a tasty thirst-quencher for hot summer days.

This specialty wheat beer gets its 'crystal clear' appearance from a particularly long filtration process, known in the industry as "fine filtration", whereby the beer becomes completely clear.

This gives Erdinger Weissbier 'crystal clear' its sparkling and refreshing character - which also makes it the ideal wheat beer for warm summer days.

Brewed in strict accordance with our own traditional recipe, Erdinger Weissbier 'crystal clear' meets the highest quality standards and satisfies the most sophisticated palate.
style: Light American Wheat Ale or Lager
